remarks: Cancellation law for multiplication.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 21-Feb-2020.)
statement:
mulcand.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulcand.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulcand.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
mulcand.4 $e |- ( ph -> C # 0 ) $.
mulcanap2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. C ) = ( B x. C ) <-> A = B ) ) $.
